entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
